data.text: @WeakleyMike @orlandosentinel He asked politely. It is covid theater if you wear a mask for a camera but then don't do the same elsewhere.

@orlandosentinel And how sad & pathetic is it that @GovRonDeSantis will mock & publicly shame teens for wearing masks, but refused to publicly condemn actual, literal Nazis who came to Orlando spewing antisemitic & racist hate.

@Charles35546443 @orlandosentinel He ALSO actually said (which you conveniently left out) “Please take them off", "We’ve gotta stop with this COVID theater", & "this is ridiculous.”  No one is spinning this any better than you.
@scd89 @orlandosentinel @GovRonDeSantis #Deathsantis has no respect because he’s not talking to you, he’s talking to his illiterate base who lap up this kind of propaganda.

@OrlandoCash4HM @orlandosentinel And @GovRonDeSantis takes center stage as the star & director of this stooge play over masks. If you could read the foreign press, you’d understand what I mean. Too bad most Americans speak & read English only.Only 1 in 2 Americans read at 6th grade level. No wonder he’s guv.

@orlandosentinel The Parent of the students that were humiliated and faced child endangerment by Gov DeSantis need to get a lawyer immediately! He endangered the students when the parents wanted them to wear masks! In addition he  humiliated them in the nations press media!

@orlandosentinel Ron DeSantis said:
Joe Rogan 'Shouldn't Have Apologized' for Slurs of the N-Word or any other defamatory words or statements! 

Ron DeSantis the short-term Governor of Florida has gone on record as condoning slanderous statements all in the name of freedom. 
VOTE HIM OUT IN 2022!
@orlandosentinel @GovRonDeSantis YOUR THE MAN!!!! Keep on keepn on!!!!
@orlandosentinel School bullies shouldn’t be governors. #RonDeSantis is unfit & unhinged.
